title: Google Smashes Revenue Forecasts
text: Google parent Alphabet Inc. ( GOOG , Financial)( GOOGL , Financial) reported an astounding first quarter that far exceeded analysts' expectations in several metrics. The numbers reveal that Google is the undisputed king of the digital ad hill.

title: Why Alphabet Stock Jumped More Than 6% Today
text: Business is booming across the technology giant's various services.

title: Analysis: For Google, plenty of cash with nowhere to go
text: In announcing a $50-billion share buyback on Tuesday, Google-owner Alphabet Inc confirmed a paradoxical dynamic: its core advertising business is so profitable, and so dominant, that it has few options for usefully deploying its cash.

title: Alphabet's Gain, Microsoft's Drop Leave Nasdaq in Limbo
text: The benchmark didn't make major moves in part because of mixed performance from key tech stocks.

title: 4 Reasons Google's Stock Is Trading Higher Today
text: Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOG) shares are trading 4.6% higher at $2414.07 on Wednesday at the time of publication. Here are four catalysts moving the stock higher:

title: Google Analysts Bullish Following Earnings Beat: 'Well Positioned For Reopening Tailwinds'
text: Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) shares traded higher after the company reported a first-quarter earnings beat on Tuesday afternoon. For the first quarter, Alphabet reported adjusted EPS of $26.29 on $55.3 billion in revenue.

title: Google is facing a lawsuit after a privacy flaw in its contact tracing tech exposed Android users' data to third-party apps (GOOGL, AAPL)
text: Google is facing a lawsuit after a privacy vulnerability in its contact tracing system left users' data exposed. Google was alerted in February that users' sensitive data was exposed to third-party apps that were already installed on their mobile devices and that it failed to inform the public, according to the analysis company AppCensus and a report from The Markup.

title: Alphabet, Aurora Cannabis, NXP Semiconductors and More Wednesday Afternoon Analyst Calls
text: With the trading day about halfway over, the broader markets were somewhat mixed. The S&P 500 briefly hit an all-time high and quickly pulled back just after the open.

title: Alphabet (GOOGL) Earnings Insights, Analysis, and Takeaways
text: Alphabet (aka Google) reported corporate earnings after the market close on Tuesday. The report was solid, sending shares of $GOOGL higher.

title: Alphabet (GOOGL) Earnings Crush Q1 Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
text: Alphabet's (GOOGL) first-quarter 2021 results benefits from strength in its search, cloud and YouTube businesses.

title: Global stocks climb as investors look towards Fed decision, while US futures dip ahead of Apple and Facebook earnings (DJI, IXIC, NDX, SPX, AAPL, FB, GOOGL, TSLA, MSFT)
text: US futures dipped on Wednesday, while global stocks moved broadly higher as investors waited for the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision and digested more earnings reports from major companies. Futures for the tech-heavy Nasdaq 100 slipped 0.11%, after the index closed slightly lower on Tuesday. Dow Jones futures dipped 0.15% but S&P 500 futures climbed 0.06% after both closed roughly flat the previous day.

title: 8 Stocks To Watch For April 28, 2021
text: Some of the stocks that may grab investor focus today are: Wall Street expects General Dynamics Corporation (NYSE: GD) to report quarterly earnings at $2.30 per share on revenue of $8.88 billion before the opening bell. General Dynamics shares rose 0.4% to close at $185.89 on Tuesday.
